summary: July 23 is the 204th day of the year  in the Gregorian calendar.
full_text: On July 23, 1999, an All Nippon Airways Boeing 747-481D with 503 passengers on Flight 61 , including 14 children and 14 crew members on board, took off from Tokyo International Airport  in Ota, Tokyo, Japan and was en route to New Chitose Airport in Chitose, Japan, near Sapporo when it was hijacked by Yuji Nishizawa .
title: ANA Flight 61
